name: 魏敏樺
objective:
1. 巨陣
2. 線性聯立微分方程
3. 向量分析
4. 富利葉級數及富利葉積分
5. 偏微分方程及邊界值問題
schedule:
1	Introduction
2	6.1 Basic Concepts: Matrix Addition, Scalar Multiplication
        6.2 Matrix Multiplication
3	6.3 Linear System of Eqns. Gauss Elimination
        6.4 Rank of Matrix. Linear Independence.
4	6.5 Solutions of Linear Systems: Existence, Uniqueness, General Form
        6.6 Determinants. Cramer’s Rule
5	6.7 Inverse of a Matrix. Gauss-Jordan Elimination
6	7.1 Eigenvalues, Eigenvectors
        7.3 Symmetric, Skew-Symmetric, and Orthogonal Matrices
7	7.4 Complex Matrices: Hermitian, Skew-Hermitian, Unitary
        7.5 Similarity of Matrices. Diagonalization
8      Vector Analysis
9	Midterm Exam
10	10.1 Periodic Functions. Trigonometric Series
        10.2 Fourier Series
11	10.3 Functions of Any Period p = 2L
        10.4 Even and Odd Functions. Half-Range Expansions
12	10.5 Complex Fourier Series
        10.6 Forced Oscillations
13	10.7 Approximation by Trigonometric Polynomials
        10.8 Fourier Integrals
14	10.9 Fourier Cosine and Sine Transforms
        10.10 Fourier Transform
15	PDE
16	PDE
17	PDE
18	Final Exam
scorePolicy: HW/Quizzes, Exams: 100% (zero, if absent 缺考者以零分計算)
materials:
參考書目：
1. Zill, D.G. & Wright, W.S. (2014). Advanced Engineering Mathematics. 5th Ed. The Jones and Bartlett Publishers, USA.
2. Erwin Kreyszig (2011). Advanced Engineering Mathematics. 10th ed. John Wiley & Sons, Inc.
3. Peter O’Neil (2011). Advanced Engineering Mathematics. 7th ed. Cengage.
